__TOC__

Our goal is to promote Ubuntu and provide help and support to existing Ubuntu users.

On our website (<nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.si]]</nowiki>) you can find general information about Ubuntu and Ubuntu derivatives, Ubuntu related <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.si/novice|news]]</nowiki>, a <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.si/dokuwiki/doku.php?id=clanki|wiki]]</nowiki> with over 60 tutorials and articles and a <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.si/punbb/|forum]]</nowiki> with over 2000 registered users, 4700 topics and 33.000 posts.

=== Key Details ===
* '''Date''' - <code>datetime.datetime(now)</code> ;) -- Set before applying.
* '''Team Contact''' - David Klasinc <bigwhale@lubica.net>
* '''Membership''' - 2042 as of September 21st 2011
* '''Mailing List''' - <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-si|ubuntu-si]]</nowiki> on lists.ubuntu.com
* '''IRC''' - <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=#ubuntu-si|#ubuntu-si]]</nowiki> on Freenode
* '''Facebook''' - <nowiki>[[http://www.facebook.com/UbuntuSlovenija|Ubuntu Slovenija]]</nowiki>

=== Experience ===

* Translation Status:
** As the pictures and links underneath show, our biggest effort was to improve 10.10 translations.
    {{http://file.si/files/19693_ht4ot/Ubuntu10.04TranslationStats.png|Translation of 10.04}}
    {{http://file.si/files/20238_hlq1q/Ubuntu10.10TranslationStats.png|Translation of 10.10}}

    Source: <nowiki>[[http://people.ubuntu.com/~dpm/ubuntu-10.04-translation-stats.html|10.04 Statistics]]</nowiki> &  <nowiki>[[http://people.ubuntu.com/~dpm/ubuntu-10.10-translation-stats.html|10.10 Statistics]]</nowiki>
** From the links above it's obvious that Slovenian team made the biggest translation jump (15% increase). We are very proud of our work.

* Ubuntu.si growth chart from august 2005 till present day (2.10.2010)
   {{http://file.si/files/19696_pqsmq/Ubuntu.siGrowthChart.png|Ubuntu.si growth chart}}

==== Activities ====
** ''Old hardware collection'' - collecting old hardware for children in Uganda - <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.si/punbb/topic/2573/|discussion at ubuntu.si forum]]</nowiki>
** ''Ubuntu stickers'' - Ubuntu stickers by Blaž Praper - <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.si/punbb/topic/1503/|discussion at ubuntu.si forum]]</nowiki>
** ''Ubuntu Slovenian Translators'' - Slovene Ubuntu localization group - <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-l10n-sl|ubuntu-I10n-sl at launchpad]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Ubuntu-l10n-sl|ubuntu-I10n-sl at wiki]]</nowiki>, 
** ''Ubuntu Lite'' - Ubuntu for older computers by Matic Ahačič - <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=98233|Ubuntu lite at ubuntuforums.org]]</nowiki>
** ''Linux Support Ranking System'' - https://wiki.lugos.si/projekti:podprtost-linuxa users can now rank (and see) how good is linux supported over various Slovenian services (banks, universities etc.).
** ''Slovenian Ubuntu mirror'' - a mirror for Ubuntu sponsored by ARNES - The Academic and Research Network of Slovenia http://www.arnes.si/
** On October 3rd 2010 we created <nowiki>[[http://www.youtube.com/user/UbuntuSlovenija|Ubuntu Slovenija YouTube account]]</nowiki>
** October 4th 2010 - first video uploaded. Topic: how to add or/and remove software with software center
** One of our members Slovenian version of Ubuntu 10.04 called Slobuntu2 (second edition).<nowiki>[[http://linuxtracker.org/index.php?page=torrent-details&id=5ec832db5feacd700fd48cdd3dea9e83a892708e|You can find it here]]</nowiki> and read more about it <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.si/punbb/topic/4123/|here]]</nowiki>.
** ''Ubuntu.si shirts'' - ubuntu.si shirts (<nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.si/punbb/viewtopic.php?pid=3616#p3616|discussion at ubuntu.si forum]]</nowiki>) (thanks to Hehe d.o.o, Vigred, Kiberpipa and Lugos)
** ''Joining LUGOS'' - We're now a (proud!) section of LUGOS (<nowiki>[[http://www.lugos.si|Linux User Group Of Slovenia]]</nowiki>)
    LUGOS is a formal non-profit organization and there is a mutual benefit if we work together.
** ''First Open Source Day @ FIŠ'' - (16.3.2011) - http://student.fis.unm.si/?p=43
** ''Veliki POK - all-slovenian open source barbecue'' - http://www.ubuntu.si/punbb/topic/4874/
** ''Second Open Source Day @ FIŠ'' - (16.3.2012) - http://student.fis.unm.si/?p=279
** ''Second POK - all-slovenian open source BBQ'' - (23.6.2012) - https://www.ubuntu.si/2012/06/vabilo-na-piknik-odprte-kode-pok-2012/
** ''Translated FAQ '' - Faq is now available from ubuntudocs - http://www.ubuntu.si/faq/
** ''Redesign of our first page & forum @ ubuntu.si''  - available since 2012
** ''Translated Ubuntu Manual'' - available since september 2012 at https://www.ubuntu.si/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/ubuntu-manual-sl-final.pdf
** ''Ubuntu in browser'' - available at https://www.ubuntu.si/ogled/sl/
** ''Presentation of Ubuntu in impress.js'' - available at https://www.ubuntu.si/predstavitev/
